file.name: openapi-urlshort.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: URL Shortener API
  description: shortens urls
  version: 0.1.9
servers:
  - url: /{shortURL}
    description: Send Links to this URL to Return Shortened URL and Original URL as JSON (Returns Both to Give Batch Feedback)
  - url: /expand
    description: Send Short URL to this URL to Return Original URL as JSON
paths:
  /short:
    post:
      summary: Returns a JSON Object with originalURL and shortURL.
      description: Creates Short URL.
      requestBody:
        description: The URL to be shortened
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/Url"
            example:
              originalURL: google.com
        
      responses:
        '200':    # status code
          description: Successfully Added to DynamoDB
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/result"
              example:
                statusCode: 200
                # Parseable JSON
                body: "{shortURL: localhost:3000/J1odjwD2,
                      originalURL: google.com}"
        '406':    # status code
          description: Error in method
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/result"
              examples:
                noData:
                  value:
                    statusCode: 406
                    body: "Error: No Data in Body"
                badData:
                  value:
                    statusCode: 406
                    body: "Error: Pass proper JSON"
        '500':    # status code
          description: Error in passing to DDB
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/result"
              example:
                statusCode: 500
                body: "Directly pass error from DDB SDK as JSON"
  /{shortURL}:
    get:
      summary: Redirects user to the original URL
      description: Retrieves original URL from DynamoDB and redirects to it
      parameters:
        - name: shortURL
          in: path
          required: true
          description: The shortened url key
          content:
            '*/*':
              schema:
                type: string
          
      responses:
        '301':    # status code
          description: Successfully Retrieved from DynamoDB 
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: 
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/redirect"
              example: 
                statusCode: 301
                headers: "{Location: http://google.com}"
        '404':    # status code
          description: Provided URL does not exist
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/result"
              example: 
                statusCode: 404
                body: "URL Does Not Exist"
components:
  schemas:
    Url:
      required:
        - originalURL
      properties:
        originalURL:
          type: string
    result:
      required:
        - statusCode
        - body
      properties:
        statusCode:
          type: integer
        body:
          type: string
    redirect:
      required:
        - statusCode
        - headers
      properties:
        statusCode:
          type: integer
        headers:
          type: string

Error: parse: parse spec: parse servers: at 1:2361: path parameter not specified: "shortURL"
